long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid unnecessary clutter and disorganization in your tabs bar by using this simple, easy-to-use extension which sorts tabs according to their base URL. There will be clear "clusters" of tabs corresponding to the websites you are currently visiting rather than a complete mishmash.
